author: entertainment.ie
title: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: Hodson Bay Hotel
text:
Hodson Bay Hotel, Athlone, Co. Roscommon
Relaxing Lakelands Break: â‚¬149pps - 2 nights Bed & Breakfast and Dinner on both evenings.
Includes a free local activity voucher (choose from a wide ranging list). Discover the 'Centre of Ireland' by boat and experience its many hidden gems on a river cruise.
Enjoy a brisk walk or unwind with a spot of golf or fishing. Pamper yourself in the spa or treat yourself to some shopping in Athlone. There are also daily complimentary in-house activities such as wine or whiskey tasting.
This is a midweek offer, valid September 1 to November 15, 2015.
www.hodsonbayhotel.com
